description: Tomb Raider studio Crystal Dynamics has announced a new round of layoffs, the second this year at the company. The developer is laying off an unspecified number of employees. The announcement comes after Microsoft cancelled the Perfect Dark reboot, which was being co-developed by Crystal Dynamics.
title: Crystal Dynamics Announces Second Round of Layoffs This Year, Says Next Tomb Raider Game Is Unaffected

description: Samsung could unveil the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra at its Galaxy event next week. Ahead of the launch, the tablet has reportedly appeared on benchmarking platforms, revealing key details including its model number and specifications.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra Visits Geekbench With Dimensity 9400+ SoC; Specifications Leaked Days Ahead of Debut

description: Samsung’s latest SmartThings Family Care update enables even novice users to install and set up the app independently, with caregivers sharing guided invitation links. It balances convenience and privacy, letting care recipients control shared information while caregivers access relevant details. Other features include inactivity alerts for appliances, health monitoring via Samsung Health, location tracking with permission, and customisable reminders for appointments, medications, and events.
title: Samsung SmartThings Family Care Update Adds New Safety Features, Simplifies Setup Process

description: Anthropic's findings, published in a report, highlight growing concerns that AI tools are increasingly exploited in cybercrime, intensifying calls for tech firms and regulators to strengthen safeguards as the technology spreads.
title: Anthropic Thwarts Hacker Attempts to Misuse Claude AI for Cybercrime

description: Apple and Samsung have reportedly sent legal notices to Xiaomi over its campaign for the Xiaomi 15 Ultra, which allegedly hurts the two tech giants' brand reputation. In one of the ads, the company compares its latest flagship with the iPhone 16 Pro Max, which was launched in September 2024. The company has reportedly published similar ads for Samsung’s smartphones as well.
title: Apple, Samsung Reportedly Send Legal Notices to Xiaomi Over Recent Ads

description: The Cupertino, California-based technology giant's six radio stations will be available outside its app for the first time on TuneIn to its 75 million monthly active users.
title: Apple Teams Up With TuneIn to Boost Radio Features Amid Streaming Competition

description: Google has reportedly alerted 2.5 billion Gmail account holders after a password hacker group was able to carry out a “successful intrusion.” As per the report, the incident occurred between August 8 and 18 in a widespread attack via compromised Open Authorisation (OAuth) tokens. Apart from targeting individual accounts, the threat actors have also targeted Salesforce’s database containing information about its customers, the Google Threat Intelligence Group (GTIG) has found.
title: Google Data Breach Exposed 2.5 Billion Accounts: How to Secure Your Gmail Account

description: Google Phone app will now allow Android users to create custom calling cards for specific contacts. The company will let users add images, add effects, edit text, and background colour to their preference. The feature resembles Apple’s contact cards feature, which lets users add an image or background colour to a specific contact’s number. While iPhone owners can only add images, Android owners also have the option to add a video to the profile card.
title: Google Phone App Updated With Support for Custom 'Profile Cards' With Images, Video

description: The Huawei FreeBuds SE 4, priced at GBP 59.99 (around Rs. 7,100) in the UK, is sold via Huawei’s official website. The TWS headset features 10mm dynamic drivers, up to 24dB ANC with multiple modes, and a three-mic system for clearer calls. The earphones offer Bluetooth 5.4, proximity pairing, touch controls, and IP54 dust and splash resistance. The earbuds have a 41mAh battery, and the case has a 510mAh battery, delivering up to 50 hours total playback without ANC.
title: Huawei FreeBuds SE 4 Launched With ANC, Up to 50 Hours of Total Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Huawei Mate XTs will soon launch in China. As we wait for the announcement, the company has opened pre-reservations for the smartphones via its official online store in China. The listing confirms the design, colour options and RAM and storage variants of the phones.
title: Huawei Mate XTs Design and Colourways Revealed; Pre-Reservations Begin Ahead of September 4 Launch

description: Deadbots are trained on the digital footprints of an individual, such as text messages, emails, voice recordings, videos, social media profiles, and more. A large language model (LLM) is trained on this dataset, and it can generate responses that appear similar to what the person would have said, in the manner that they would have said.
title: Resurrecting the Dead Using AI: What Are Deadbots and Why Are They Stirring Ethical Debate?

description: India’s tablet market saw a 32.2 percent YoY decline in shipments in the first half of 2025, according to IDC. Despite the overall slump, Samsung maintained its lead with a 41.3 market share, followed by Lenovo in second place and Apple in third. Xiaomi ranked fourth, while Acer secured the fifth spot.
title: Tablet Shipments in India Declined 32.2 Percent YoY in H1 2025, Samsung Retains Leadership: IDC

description: BSNL BiTV is the government-owned telecom service provider’s IPTV service aggregator, which went live in February, in collaboration with OTTPlay. The service promises to provide access to over 25 OTT platforms and more than 450 live TV channels. Now, the telco has announced a new “premium pack” for the BiTV, which is an exclusive service for BSNL’s mobile subscribers.
title: BSNL BiTV Premium Pack Announced With Over 25 OTT Platforms, More Than 450 Live TV Channels: Price, Benefits

description: IDC projects global smartphone shipments to rise 1 percent in 2025 to 1.24 billion units, driven by iOS growth and replacement demand, with a 1.5 percent compound annual growth rate through 2029. Despite weak demand in China, growth in the US, the Middle East, and Africa will offset declines. Vendors are reportedly prioritising value creation with premium designs, GenAI, foldables, and advanced cameras, supported by financing and promotions. GenAI phones are forecast to reach 370 million units in 2025.
title: Global Smartphone Market to Grow 1 Percent in 2025, Despite Challenging Economy, Soft Demand: IDC

description: In a court filing at the High Court of Karnataka in southwestern India, A23, which offers rummy and poker games, said the law "criminalises the legitimate business of playing online games of skill, which would result in the closure of various gaming companies overnight".
title: Online Money Games Ban Faces First Legal Challenge From Rummy, Poker Games Firm A23

description: Amazfit Helio Strap and Amazfit Balance 2 have been launched in India. The new wearables have 5ATM water resistance and are compatible with the Zepp app. They have a BioTracker 6.0 PPG sensor for monitoring heart rate. Amazfit Balance 2 features a 1.5-inch AMOLED screen, while the Helio Strao doesn't have a display.
title: Amazfit Helio Strap Smartband, Amazfit Balance 2 Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Google Translate is getting an artificial intelligence (AI) upgrade that adds two new utility features. The Mountain View-based tech giant’s translation app has so far allowed users to copy and paste text to type and get instant translation across a large selection of languages. Now, the tech giant is using its Gemini AI models to add two new features.
title: Google Translate Is Adding a Gemini AI-Powered Feature That Can Rival Duolingo

description: Microsoft announced Wednesday that it was bringing Xbox Cloud Gaming beta to Game Pass Core and Standard tiers. The cloud gaming feature will be available to Xbox Insiders and may be rolled out widely in the future. Xbox Insiders on the lower Game Pass tiers are also getting PC gaming support.
title: Microsoft Is Bringing Xbox Cloud Gaming, PC Games to Game Pass Core and Standard Tiers

description: Xiaomi on Thursday announced HyperOS 3 as the latest OS for Xiaomi devices such as smartphones, smartwatches and smart TVs. Among the many new features is Super Island, a new notification system modelled after Apple’s Dynamic Island, promising information accessibility with a multi-island approach. It includes improvements such as AI-powered wallpapers, customisable photo albums, improved translation functions, and an upgraded Super XiaoAi assistant.
title: Xiaomi Announces HyperOS 3 With Dynamic Wallpapers, Improved Interconnectivity With Apple Devices

description: Apple has reportedly partnered with Indian telecom service provider Reliance Jio to offer Rich Communication Services (RCS) messaging in the country. As per the report, this move will allow iPhone users with Jio as their carrier to send and receive text messages with iMessage-like features such as read receipts (individual chats), typing indicators, and sending high-resolution media.
title: Apple Reportedly Partners With Reliance Jio to Bring RCS Messaging to Indian iPhone Users

description: The crypto market steadied Thursday, with Bitcoin trading at $112,928 after a 1.2% rise, while Ethereum slipped 1.3 percent to $4,570 ahead of a $5 billion options expiry due Friday. Altcoins such as Solana, BNB, Dogecoin, and XRP showed modest gains, reflecting cautious optimism. Analysts pointed to Ethereum ETF inflows and options activity as drivers of sentiment, while Bitcoin ETFs also reversed recent outflows. Macroeconomic data later today could further shape the direction of crypto markets
title: Ethereum Slips as Anticipation Builds Ahead of Options Expiry, Bitcoin Hovers Above $112,000

description: Former Poco India head Himanshu Tandon has join CMF by Nothing, the company announced on Thursday. The executive departed the Xiaomi subsidiary in July after serving as the Country Head for more than three years. Tandon joins CMF by Nothing as the Vice President of Business, aiming to accelerate CMF’s growth and oversee its global strategy, growth, and go-to-market execution for India and the international markets.
title: Former Poco India Head Himanshu Tandon Joins CMF by Nothing as Vice President of Business

description: Motorola has launched the Moto Buds Loop and Moto Buds Bass in India, priced at Rs. 7,999 and Rs. 1,999, respectively. The Buds Loop feature 12mm drivers tuned by Bose, spatial sound, dual mics with CrystalTalk AI, Bluetooth 5.4, an IP54 rating, and is claimed to offer up to 39-hour battery life. Meanwhile, the Buds Bass include 12.4mm drivers, Hi-Res LDAC, up to 50dB ANC, Spatial Audio, Bluetooth 5.3, and is said to offer up to 48-hour of total playback.
title: Moto Buds Loop With Bose-Tuned Audio Launched in India Alongside Moto Buds Bass: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus 15 leaks have been surfacing online for a while, suggesting the specifications of the upcoming handset. The phone is widely expected to succeed the OnePlus 13, which was launched in India earlier this year in January. Previously, several specifications of the handset, like display, camera, and chipset, have been leaked online, along with its supposed launch timeline.
title: OnePlus 15 Leaks: Know About the Launch Date, Price, Design, and Specs

description: Meta is reportedly witnessing the departure of multiple employees just two months after creating its new artificial intelligence (AI) division, Superintelligence Labs. As per the report, both veteran employees and recent joiners working within the AI division have left the company to either return to their previous employers or pursue different ventures.
title: Meta Reportedly Faces AI Talent Exodus Just Months After Superintelligence Labs Push

description: Zerodha co-founder Nithin Kamath has raised concerns about India’s booming crypto futures market, pointing to extreme leverage and tax loopholes driving the surge. Unlike spot trades that fall under strict taxation, futures remain in a regulatory grey zone, enabling traders to bypass both TDS and the 30% tax on VDAs. Experts caution that while leverage can exceed 50x, the lack of oversight leaves investors exposed to heightened financial risks
title: Nithin Kamath Points Out Risks in India’s Developing Crypto Market Future

description: Sony has announced the PS Plus monthly games for September. Platforming adventure Psychonauts 2, farm life sim Stardew Valley, and puzzle title Viewfinder will join the service on September 2.
title: PS Plus Monthly Games for September Announced: Psychonauts 2, Stardew Valley and Viewfinder

description: Realme 15T could launch soon. Ahead of any official confirmation, alleged marketing images of the smartphone have surfaced on the Web. It is tipped to come in three colours with a MediaTek Dimensity 6400 Max processor. It could measure 7.79mm in thickness and 181 grams in weight.
title: Realme 15T Leaked Images Hint at Price in India, Design and Specifications

description: Xiaomi 16 series is expected to launch soon in China. Apart from the standard model, the lineup is said to include the Xiaomi 16 Pro, Xiaomi 16 Ultra, and a compact variant, which could be dubbed Xiaomi 16 Pro Mini. Ahead of its supposed unveiling in late September, three of the four phones in the lineup have been spotted on the 3C certification website in China, revealing their charging speed.
title: Xiaomi 16 Series Surfaces on China's 3C Website With 100W Fast Charging Support

description: TSMC is reportedly set to begin mass production of 2-nanometer chips in late 2025, with capacity at its Baoshan and Kaohsiung plants expected to remain fully utilised through 2026. Apple is said to have secured nearly half of the output, making it TSMC’s top customer, while Qualcomm ranks second. Other initial adopters of the process include AMD, Broadcom, Intel, and MediaTek. The technology is expected to debut in Apple’s iPhone 18 series in 2026.
title: Apple Set to Take Nearly Half of TSMC’s 2nm Chip Production: Report

description: The top OTT platforms like Netflix, Aha Tamil, and Prime Video are set to offer the best content for weekend watching. The top releases include Akkenam, Maareesan and more. Viewers can watch these movies on the listed platforms.
title: New Tamil OTT Releases This Month (August 2025): Peranbum Perungobamum, Akkenam, Maareesan, and More

description: Nothing Phone 3 live demo units in New Zealand were reportedly representing stock images, not clicked from the phone, as its camera samples. This came to notice when an alleged screen recording of the handset showing these images surfaced online. Following this, a company executive had to come out with an explanation for this, calling it "an unfortunate oversight".
title: Nothing Phone 3 Fake Camera Samples: Co-Founder Issues Clarification, Says Investigation Underway

description: OpenAI partnered with Anthropic for a first-of-its-kind alignment evaluation exercise, with the aim of finding gaps in the other company's internal safety measures. The findings from this collaboration were shared publicly on Wednesday, highlighting interesting behavioural insights about their popular artificial intelligence (AI) models. OpenAI found Claude models to be more prone to jailbreaking attempts compared to its o3 and o4-mini models.
title: OpenAI Partners With Anthropic to Find Safety Flaws in Each Other’s AI Models

description: WhatsApp on Wednesday announced a new feature that leverages AI to rewrite text for different tones and clarity. As per the Meta-owned instant messaging platform, users can draft a basic text, and the AI-powered writing assistant will provide suggestions for improvement, including different tones and styles. WhatsApp said that its new Writing Help is built on top of Private Processing technology, and the chats or responses will not be read by anyone other than the user.
title: WhatsApp Rolls Out AI-Powered Writing Help Feature to Rephrase Text for Different Styles and Tones

description: The Tamil action-drama Gevi is now streaming on Sun NXT after its theatrical release in July 2025. Directed by Tamil Dhayalan, the film stars Sheela Rajkumar in a powerful role and explores themes of survival, injustice, and community resilience, set against the backdrop of Kodaikanal’s striking hills.
title: Gevi Now Streaming on Sun NXT: What You Need to Know About This Gripping Tamil Action-Drama Online

description: Season 2 of Hazbin Hotel is back after a long overdue break, and the story continues from its plot. Charlie, the princess of Hell, enjoys her time while exploring her bon wth Vaggie. With significant musical numbers and a story, Season 2 is set to raise the stakes of redemption. Watch Season 2 on Prime Video on the 29th October 2025.
title: Hazbin Hotel Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch the New Season Online?

description: Jio is extending prepaid, postpaid, and JioHome plans for users in flood-affected Jammu and Kashmir, Ladakh, and Himachal Pradesh. Prepaid Mobile customers receive unlimited calls and 2GB of daily high-speed data, while JioHome users get three extra days of plan benefits. Postpaid and JioHome subscribers also get a three-day bill payment grace period. Similarly, Airtel is offering three-day plan extensions, free calls and data for prepaid users, and bill payment leniency for postpaid and broadband customers in the affected regions.
title: Jio Offers Extended Validity, Additional Benefits to Flood-Impacted Customers in Jammu, Kashmir, Ladakh, Himachal Pradesh

description: Oppo Find X9 specifications leaked online. It is expected to bring several major upgrades, including a newer chipset, a larger battery, a higher-resolution selfie camera, and a new Plus Key, compared to the Oppo Find X8. It could feature the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset and a 6.59-inch OLED display.
title: Oppo Find X9 to Launch With Dimensity 9500 SoC, 7,025mAh Battery and More Upgrades: Report

description: The Apple AirTag is one of the very few products in Apple’s device portfolio that has not been updated in a very long time. The first-generation AirTag debuted in 2021, and since then, only a handful of new features have been added with software updates. However, the launch of its successor might finally be on the cards. As per reports, the AirTag 2 could be introduced at Apple’s September event alongside the iPhone 17 series and other products. Here’s everything we know.
title: Apple AirTag 2 Reportedly Set to Launch Alongside iPhone 17 Series Next Month: Everything We Know

description: The R&D centre in Bengaluru has been a key contributor to the company's portfolio, focusing on developing India-specific features that eventually make their way to the rest of the world. Gadgets 360 recently participated in a select media briefing with Mohan Rao Goli, Corporate Vice President (CVP) and Managing Director at the SRI, Bengaluru, which is the largest overseas software R&D centre under Samsung Research. The centre focuses on making customised features for Indian consumers.
title: From Bengaluru to the World: Inside Samsung’s Methodical Hunt for the Next Billion-Dollar Feature

description: Samsung dropped a surprise announcement on Wednesday in the form of a new Galaxy event, set to take place in the first week of September. The South Korean tech conglomerate has teased the launch of new premium artificial intelligence (AI) tablets and the newest member of the Galaxy S25 family. As per recent rumours, these are likely references to the Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 series and the Galaxy S25 FE.
title: Samsung Galaxy Event Announced for September 4; Galaxy S25 FE, Galaxy Tab S11 Series Expected

description: As the viewers get ready to watch some binge-worthy series and movies, the top OTT platforms are also set with new releases. This week’s top releases include Metro In Dino, Thunderbolts, Kingdom, Karate Kid: Legends, and more. Stream them now on Netflix, SonyLIV, Jio, and more.
title: OTT Releases This Week (Aug 25- Aug 31): Metro In Dino, Thunderbolts, Kingdom, Rambo in Love, and More

description: The months of July and August were packed in terms of smartphone launches, and September is shaping up to be just as busy. Several smartphones from brands such as Apple, Motorola, Oppo, and Samsung are expected to make their debut. Here is our list of upcoming smartphones for September 2025 to present a clearer picture of what’s to come.
title: Upcoming Smartphones in September 2025: iPhone 17 Series, Samsung Galaxy S25 FE, Motorola Razr 60 Brilliant Collection Launch Date, and More
